explains: v. 炙烤（grill 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: grilled chicken 烤鸡；烧鸡；炙鸡

sentences.en: Tuna can be grilled, fried or barbecued.
sentences.cn: 金枪鱼可以烤、煎或烧烤着吃。

sentences.en: Grilled trout needs only a squeeze of lemon.
sentences.cn: 烤鳟鱼只需要一点柠檬榨汁。

sentences.en: You can get grilled cheese sandwiches.
sentences.cn: 你可以吃到烤奶酪三明治。
